name: GWENT: The Witcher Card Game
notes:
You'll have to install Gwent manually through GOG Galaxy.

The game might not accept any mouse/keyboard input after you pressed ALT+TAB.

If the game launches but you get black screen after loading then rename the file `drive_c/Program Files (x86)/GOG Galaxy/Games/Gwent/Gwent_Data/StreamingAssets/videos/gwent/tut001_narrator_intro` to `tut001_narrator_intro2` (or just delete the file). This should only be required if you haven't done the ingame tutorial yet.
content:
files:
- galaxy: https://cdn.gog.com/open/galaxy/client/setup_galaxy_1.2.54.23.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: /deelevated
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/GOG Galaxy/GalaxyClient.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts vcrun2012 vcrun2013 vcrun2015
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: galaxy
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
